name: Marnie (Pokemon S/S) LoRA [8 MB]
description:
This is a micro-LoRA for Marnie from Pokémon Sword and Shield.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

  • These images were generated using AOM2 with the AnythingV3 VAE.

  • Always add this to the prompt to activate it - marnie \(pokemon\)

  • This LoRA works best with her traditional clothes - pink dress, black jacket, choker and other descriptive tags.

All pictures were upscaled using Hires. option on AUTO111

  • Upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime 6B

  • Hires. Steps: 10, Upscale by 1.5, Denoising Strength: 0.3

Known Issues

  • The pendant on her choker will be warped - 80% of the time.

  • It was trained on pictures of Marnie with blue and green eyes, so It will jump in-between the two eye colors, you can just add green eyes or blue eyes to force one.

  • I suggest adding - asymmetrical bangs - If the hair starts getting wonky.

  • The site crashed while I was adding prompts to the pictures before I could save and now those few will remain without prompt.

Embeds and LoRAs used in prompts - Bad Prompt - AfroBull Style

Be sure to leave a comment, review and check out my other stuff here - you might like it.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
